Text:
The name Final Fantasy comes from the content, the fantasy, story in it ends. Not counting ffx-2, ff12.

So there you go racist.

boegroeff, have you ever even played a Final Fantasy, or do you just write it off because it's Japanese?  You ignorant fool.  No one wants to hear you bitch and moan about something you know nothing about.
